title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who founded the Indian National Congress?
explanation: ✅ Allan Octavian Hume (A.O. Hume) founded the INC in 1885. The first session was held in Bombay with W.C. Bonnerjee as President.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: When did the Jallianwala Bagh massacre take place?
explanation: ✅ It occurred on 13 April 1919 in Amritsar during Baisakhi festival. General Dyer ordered fire on a peaceful crowd.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the first Governor-General of Bengal?
explanation: ✅ Warren Hastings became the first Governor-General of Bengal through the Regulating Act of 1773.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: The 'Quit India Movement' was launched in which year?
explanation: ✅ Launched on 8 August 1942 at Gowalia Tank Maidan (August Kranti Maidan) in Bombay. Gandhi ji gave the 'Do or Die' slogan.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who is known as the 'Iron Man of India'?
explanation: ✅ Sardar Vallabhbhai Patel is known as the Iron Man for his role in integrating 562 princely states into the Indian Union.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who said 'Swaraj is my birthright and I shall have it'?
explanation: ✅ Bal Gangadhar Tilak gave this famous slogan. He was a prominent leader of the extremist faction of the INC.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the founder of 'Brahmo Samaj'?
explanation: ✅ Raja Ram Mohan Roy founded Brahmo Samaj in 1828 to fight social evils like Sati and promote monotheism.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: The partition of Bengal (1905) was done by?
explanation: ✅ Lord Curzon partitioned Bengal in 1905 on the pretext of administrative convenience, which led to the Swadeshi Movement.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who wrote the book 'Discovery of India'?
explanation: ✅ This book was written by Pandit Jawaharlal Nehru during his imprisonment at Ahmednagar Fort (1942–1945).

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Where did Gandhi Ji start his first Satyagraha in India?
explanation: ✅ Gandhi ji's first Satyagraha was in Champaran (Bihar) in 1917 to support indigo farmers against the Tinkathia system.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the last Viceroy of India?
explanation: ✅ Lord Mountbatten was the last British Viceroy and first Governor-General of independent India.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: When did the 'Dandi March' begin?
explanation: ✅ It began on 12 March 1930 from Sabarmati Ashram and ended on 6 April 1930 at Dandi to break the salt law.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who gave the slogan 'Jai Hind'?
explanation: ✅ Subhash Chandra Bose popularized 'Jai Hind' as a greeting for the Indian National Army (INA).

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: The 'Poona Pact' (1932) was signed between Gandhi Ji and?
explanation: ✅ Signed in Yerwada Jail, it provided reserved seats for depressed classes in provincial legislatures instead of separate electorates.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the first woman President of INC?
explanation: ✅ Annie Besant presided over the 1917 Calcutta session. Sarojini Naidu was the first 'Indian' woman president (1925).

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Which incident led to the withdrawal of Non-Cooperation Movement?
explanation: ✅ In Feb 1922, a violent incident at Chauri Chaura (UP) where a police station was burnt led Gandhi ji to call off the movement.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who is called the 'Father of Local Self Government' in India?
explanation: ✅ Lord Ripon's resolution of 1882 is considered the Magna Carta of local self-government in India.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: In which year was the 'Rowlatt Act' passed?
explanation: ✅ Passed in 1919, it gave the government power to imprison people without trial for up to two years.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who founded the 'Forward Bloc'?
explanation: ✅ Netaji Subhash Chandra Bose formed the Forward Bloc in 1939 after resigning from the presidency of the INC.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: The Revolt of 1857 started from which city?
explanation: ✅ The mutiny broke out in Meerut on 10 May 1857 and quickly spread to Delhi, Kanpur, and other regions.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the political guru of Mahatma Gandhi?
explanation: ✅ Gopal Krishna Gokhale was Gandhi ji's mentor who advised him to travel across India to understand its people.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: The 'Permanent Settlement' system was introduced by?
explanation: ✅ Introduced in 1793 in Bengal and Bihar, it fixed the land revenue for Zamindars permanently.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who gave the title 'Mahatma' to Gandhi Ji?
explanation: ✅ Rabindranath Tagore bestowed the title 'Mahatma' upon him, while Gandhi ji called Tagore 'Gurudev'.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Simon Commission visited India in which year?
explanation: ✅ The commission arrived in 1928. It was boycotted (Simon Go Back) because it had no Indian members.

title: Modern History Set-1
subject: History
question: Who was the first Indian Governor-General of independent India?
explanation: ✅ Chakravarti Rajagopalachari (Rajaji) served as the only Indian Governor-General from 1948 to 1950.
